dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 24, 2005 1:21 PM
To: copyright@nukepirates.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement
Date:         Tue, 24 May 2005 00:35:53 -0700
From:         Mike Watso <copyright@nukepirates.com>
To:         abuse@theplanet.com
CC:         c.dettner@steinberg.de, Clyde Sendke <c.sendke@steinberg.de>



*Internet Copyright Enforcement
*P.O. Box 11133
Bakersfield, CA 93389-1133
(661) 665-8157 E-mail:  Piratekiller@Nukepirates.com

May 24, 2005

DMCA Notice #: 052405-01
URL: www.Forumer.com
<http://www.forumer.com/>
http://cubasefree.11.forumer.com/viewforum.php?f=3&sid=c70e09e8b667ec1eab6e7
2a124f7f41f
<http://cubasefree.11.forumer.com/viewforum.php?f=3&sid=c70e09e8b667ec1eab6e
72a124f7f41f>IP#

69.93.108.138


*ELECTRONIC NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

*
I, the undersigned, *CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY* that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights, said owners being named:

*Steinberg Media Technologies, GmbH - Hamburg, Germany The Audio Group of
Yamaha Corporation

*
I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by the above IP Owners, their agents, or the law and therefore
infringe the IP Owner's rights. I further aver that the information
contained in the Notice below is accurate. And They have made a gave mistake
for taking our Clients Trade Maks and listed them on their website.

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing.

I may be contacted at:

Printed Name: Michael Watso
Title:  Copyright Enforcement Agent
Company: Internet Copyright Enforcement
Street Address:  PO Box 11133
City and State:  Bakersfield, CA
Zip:  93389-1133
Email (correspondence):  PirateKiller@NukePirates.com
Telephone:  (661) 665-8157
Fax:  (661) 665-8157

Truthfully,
/S/: Michael Watso

*_Allegedly Infringing items or materials:

_Infringed Work or Right:
Original Materials & Copyright Holder(s):
*Copyrighted materials belonging to Steinberg Media:
Cubase SX/SL/SE for Mac OS X
<http://cubasefree.11.forumer.com/viewforum.php?f=3>
* Steinberg Cubase SX
<http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead//pagead/iclk?sa=l&ai=BQiZPnNiSQ
sS8I73EOa_MzNsLg7ulCPmd15UBwI23AYDxBBABGAEguKvzAigESJs5qgEKMzgwNDU5MDg3OLIBG
WN1YmFzZWZyZWUuMTEuZm9ydW1lci5jb226AQk3Mjh4OTBfYXPIAQHaATJodHRwOi8vY3ViYXNlZ
nJlZS4xMS5mb3J1bWVyLmNvbS92aWV3dG9waWMucGhwP3Q9NOgBAQ&num=1&adurl=http://www
.zzounds.com/a--622089/sid--exact_content&client=ca-pub-5207631766608049>

Buy Cubase SX & Cubase SL
<http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/iclk?adurl=http://www.floridamu

of ORIGINAL WORKS:
http://www.steinberg.net <http://www.steinberg.net/> and

*URL(s) of Infringed Works or Right:
* www.Forumer.com
<http://www.forumer.com/>

72a124f7f41f>

Unless otherwise indicated, the information in this transmittal is
CONFIDENTIAL and intended only for the recipient listed above. If you are
not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for delivery of
the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this message to
anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and kindly notify the
sender by reply mail.


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
